name: builder-commands
description: Workflow automation commands for product planning, execution, and feature-driven development.

commands.name: plan-lite
commands.description: Lightweight planning optimized for free-tier users - fast and cost-effective PRD and execution plan

commands.name: plan
commands.description: Generate product requirements and execution plan with agent approval

commands.name: plan-heavy
commands.description: Deep planning with extended thinking - comprehensive PRD and execution plan using Opus

commands.name: spec-lite
commands.description: Lightweight specification analysis optimized for free-tier users

commands.name: spec
commands.description: Comprehensive specification analysis with backend, frontend, and architecture synthesis

commands.name: spec-heavy
commands.description: Deep specification analysis with extended thinking for maximum depth

commands.name: execute
commands.description: Execute the plan in todo.md using parallel subagents with coordination

commands.name: feature-driven-development
commands.description: Generate feature list and execution plan with agent approval

commands.name: product-interview
commands.description: Conduct a product interview to refine the MVP concept

commands.name: skip-permissions
commands.description: Allow all tool use without approval prompts
